description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent the Knee Injury and Osteoarthritis Outcome Score for Joint Replacement (KOOS Jr.) total interval score.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) datatype related to Assessment, Performed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with the Knee Injury and Osteoarthritis Outcome Score for Joint Replacement (KOOS Jr.) score. This is a grouping of a LOINC code.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
